title: Polestar’s new concept car has a companion drone to film your rides
content:
Driving is much more than switching pedals and steering the wheel. It’s about experiences and memory-making.  Imagine driving with speed on the open road, with the view of the sea or mountains around you, and a companion with you in the car to share the feeling of adventure.  Naturally, you’d like to savor the moment, but also save it. You could take a photo or video with your phone, but what if you could go ultra-pro? If you could film the entire ride from above?  That’s where Polestar’s new concept car comes in. And you know what? It’s stunning.  Oh,…
